Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: My advisor as more personal experience so our brainstorming sessions make me have a better understanding of the project I am working on which I can then use to brainstorm with GenAI. One thing I like GenAI for is I do not feel shy to ask it to dumb down things for me which I might feel shy to ask my advisor or even another human being.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
